import React, {Component} from 'react'; import manager from '../ethereum/manager'; import { Card, Button, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; class PollIndex extends Component { static async getInitialProps(){ const polls = await manager.methods.getDeployedPolls().call(); return {polls}; } renderPolls(){ const items=this.props.polls.map(address=>{ return { header: 'This Poll is managed by', description: address, fluid:true }; }); return } render(){ return (
